modName: Open Cities and other mod compatibility Patchs
summary: Its a collection of patches I made for my game to make different mods Compatible to each other... Accepting Requests
descriptionHtml:
Its a collection of patches I made for my game to make different mods compatible to each other

[b] List of Patches [/b]
Original Mine
[i] Open Cites and Immersive Armor[/i] - Made The Shield Painter Available in Open Cities
[i] Open Cites and Falskaar(WIP)[/i]- Makes Jalamar Available in Open Cities Riften
* This one is still broken though cant seem to make the animation work in where he argues with the guard(sometimes it works sometimes it does not)

Request
[i] Open Cites and Marriage Mod (To Have & To Hold)[/i] - Made Temple of Mara Door Compatible with Open Cities (Request) (no longer needed)
*This should not actually require a patch so long as the marriage mod loads before OCS.- Arthmoor
[i] Open Cites and Populated Cities Towns Villages[/i] - Relocated Spawn points of NPC for them to adapt to Open Cites (Request)
[i] Open Cites andThief player home in Riften Canal[/i] - Relocated Home entrance To Open Cites (Request)
*Both Male and Female Version Have Different Patches



Install
Usually NMM or drop in data folder

Uninstall
Delete from data folder

Nothing has been changed or added, just repositioned that's all.

More to come.


For requests to make any two mods compatible to each other just post it and we'll see...

Credits
Arthmoor -[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8058/?]Open Cites Skyrim[/url]
hothtrooper44 -[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19733/?]Immersive Armours[/url]
AlexanderJVelicky -[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1232562/?]Falskaar[/url]
joeThinkStudios -[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50121/?]Marriage Mod - To Have And To Hold[/url]
Elianora -[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53541/?]Thief player home in Riften Canal[/url]
RS - Populated Cities Towns Villages
author: Macpatch
